page.title: 20ENVIRONMENT
page.content: We are lucky where we live because all we have to do is go across Junction Road and we are in the{countryside. There are farms, cultivated fields and sometimes you can see animals grazing.We must learn to care more for the countryside as it is a place of pleasure and enjoyment and not everybody has the countryside right on their doorstep.{Science and Technology have made our environment healthier and more pleasant.We live in a smokeless fuel area so no house chimneys emit smoke to pollute the atmosphere.Nearby{industries}have strict restrictions on waste disposal. Nontheles there is still a high incid ence of chest and bronchial complaints complaints along with other industrial diseases.Improvement has been made but so often industrial haze caused by {pollution}overhangs the area.
